org.jmisb.api.klv

Class CrcCcitt

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmisb.api.klv.CrcCcitt

  • public class CrcCcitt
extends Object
    CRC-16 CCITT variant implementation.

    There are many implementations of CRC-16. This version is directly from Appendix D of the Motion Imagery Handbook (October 2019), Appendix D.

    No copyright is claimed over the code in this source file.

    Note that this is not the same as the ST 0601 Checksum.

      • verify

        public static boolean verify(byte[] fullMessage,
                             byte[] expected)
        Verify CRC-16 checksum for byte array.

        This uses the CRC-16 algorithm specified by the Motion Imagery Handbook (October 2019)

        This is not the same checksum as is used in ST0601.

        Parameters:
        fullMessage - Byte array of the full message packet
        expected - expected checksum value
        Returns:
        true if expected checksum validates against data.
